title: Braised duck breasts with celery and orange
ingredients: ['6 oranges', '4 skinless, boneless duck breasts, about 175g each', '2 tbsp vegetable oil', '2 onions, thinly sliced', '4 celery sticks, sliced', '1 large garlic clove, crushed', '500g small new potatoes, scrubbed and halved', '150ml chicken or vegetable stock', '1 red chilli, deseeded and thinly sliced (optional)', 'TO GARNISH chopped fresh parsley']
